summary: Rebalance of Better Bows crafting lists and damage
descriptionHtml:
This is a rebalance of the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13317]Better Bows[/url] mod.
Please endorse if you find useful, I am always happy to get endorsements.

NMM Installation:
1 [u]You must go and install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13317]Better Bows[/url] before installing this mod.[/u]
2 When asked if this is an upgrade to HBetterBows, say \"no\".
3 When asked if you wish to replace HBetterBows.esp just say \"yes\".

SkyRe Users Look here for compatibility:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28467/]T3nd0\'s Skyre Reproccer[/url]
I am not a SkyRe user, but from what T3nd0 says that should work perfectly with this mod as all the bows are vanilla in terms of crafting materials.

Description:
Just to give an example of this rebalance, check the pictures - all bows have been brought in-line with crafting recipe\'s, cost and damage of vanilla bows. This will allow you to use the bows without them breaking your game. I put a pic of a normal elven bow up so you could see a direct comparison.

For instance, the valenwood war bow was pretty easily crafted fairly early on, sold for around 5k and did about half as much again as a normal elven bow.

I changed all of that to vanilla specs for everything, so this allows you to craft the bows but makes them exactly the same costs and stats as vanilla bows are.
I also got rid of the weird NPC in the drunken huntsman that sold the 6k gold bows...
Bows appear under each and every smithing perk with the exception of daedric.

Some examples:
Valenwood War Bow is now under Ebony smithing.
Mammoth Bows are under Dragonbone smithing.
Khajit Bow is now under Dwarven - I needed a dwarven bow and the Khajit bow true to its\' name needed a home ;)

I find this useful so thought I would share.
Any problems/issues or inconsistencies tell me.

If you think you are going mad because wasn\'t this up to version 1.101beta ? You\'re not going mad (at least for this reason), I reverted it back to 1.0 because there weren\'t any problems with that.

Since then howiego08 has decided to allow anyone to mod better bows as long as they give him credit, so I will be working on a new stand alone version of this mod soon[tm].
author: thefinn
